content.body: Component functiosn aren’t executed recusively, they’re pushed into a stack to be processed later on. When you return the `<Ctx.Provider value=…><Foo /></Ctx.Provider>` VDOM, that `Foo` component won’t be executed within the sync execution of `Ctx.Provider`. If `Foo` were to `useContext(Ctx)`, that would be tracked as part of the component’s internal state (which itself is stored in a AC), it woulnd’t store the context on its own AC variable.
